introduction: Arman Suleimenov is a multi-time founder and operator, currently serving as the Founder & CEO of nFactorial Group, which encompasses nFactorial School, nFactorial AI, nFactorial Club, nFactorial Podcast, nFactorial Admissions, and nFactorial Academy. He is based in Almaty, Kazakhstan, and has a background in Computer Science from Princeton University. He has experience in e-grocery (Pinemelon.com), fintech, and various startup initiatives including Hora.AI, N17R, and Zero To One Labs.
communication_style: Arman appears to be a very active and engaged individual who shares his thoughts and experiences frequently. His presence on multiple platforms (LinkedIn, Instagram, Medium, X/Twitter, Facebook) suggests he's comfortable communicating in diverse formats. His short, daily thoughts mentioned on LinkedIn indicate he values concise and regular updates. His large follower count on Instagram suggests he's able to connect with a broad audience. As a CEO and founder, he likely communicates with a combination of directness, vision, and enthusiasm.
communication_tips: Be concise and respectful of his time.
Focus on relevant topics such as technology, entrepreneurship, or education.
Acknowledge his experience and expertise in the startup and technology fields.
Utilize a multi-channel approach if necessary (LinkedIn, email, etc.), based on the purpose of communication.
When engaging on social media, be mindful of his public persona and avoid controversial or irrelevant topics.
If pitching an idea, highlight the potential impact and scalability of the solution.
